resources.string: This is not a functional SMS app.

• Regular apps cannot revoke permissions, so reverting the Read-only option must be handled manually through Settings, which should open directly upon selecting that option.

• On API levels 29+, the default SMS app also must be reverted manually. This is accomplished by directing the previous app to re-set itself, and it too should open directly.

• Disabling the Full access option will oftentimes leave the Read-only option enabled, even if you hadn't explicitly enabled that option beforehand.

• The alert notification, if enabled, will not update until this app resumes, should a launched operation pause it.
